Description: ENUM, 0: off, 1: on (DC connect), other: undefined
ENUM, 0: off, 1: acknowlede error (reset), other: undefined
Indicates the current operational status of the battery rack (e.g., active, standby, fault).
Displays any error codes or fault conditions detected in the battery rack.
Total voltage measured across the entire battery rack.
Current flowing through the battery rack during operation.
State of Charge: percentage of remaining battery capacity relative to full charge.
State of Health: indicator of battery health compared to its original condition.
Maximum allowable charging current for the battery rack.
Maximum allowable discharging current for the battery rack.
Highest voltage recorded among all individual cells in the rack.
Lowest voltage recorded among all individual cells in the rack.
Highest temperature recorded among all individual cells in the rack.
Lowest temperature recorded among all individual cells in the rack.
Average voltage across all cells in the battery rack.
Average temperature across all cells in the battery rack.
Temperature measured at the outlet of the cooling system for the rack.
Temperature measured at the inlet of the cooling system for the rack.
Temperature of the surrounding environment near the battery rack.
